import React, { useState } from 'react' const Index = () => { const [select,setselect]=useState([]) const handleselectchange=(e)=>{ if(!select.includes(e.target.value)){ setselect([...select,e.target.value]) } console.log(select) } const handledeleteselectchange=(value)=>{ const arr=select.filter(el=>el!==value.target.value) setselect(arr) } return (
